timeline.bodyText: This is not needed. If software version is higher than data dictionary catalog version, createOrUpdateAllSystemProcedures() recreates all system procedures.
timeline.author: jyuanca

replies.bodyText: Thanks @jyuanca, I removed the upgrade script.
replies.author: msirek
